user.title: Setup TFA.me station
user.description:
Please enter IP OR mDNS name of your TFA.me device.
- mDNS: Name convention is 'tfa-me-XXX-XXX-XXX'
(XXX-XXX-XXX is the 9 digit station ID.)
- IP: Press and hold button '+' for 5 seconds at your device.

data.multiple_entities: Sensors received via different stations are different entities.
